alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Dukes; Eastern Plymouth; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 2:47AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A cluster of showers and thunderstorms with torrential rainfall will impact portions of central Dukes, southwestern Barnstable, southern Plymouth and east central Bristol Counties through 345 AM EDT... At 245 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of showers and thunderstorms with torrential rain near Fairhaven, or 8 miles southeast of New Bedford, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... New Bedford, Fall River, Plymouth, Barnstable, Dartmouth, Falmouth, Marion, Oak Bluffs, Edgartown, Tisbury, Middleborough, Wareham, Sandwich, Bourne, Fairhaven, Duxbury, Mashpee, Kingston, Carver and Lakeville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Barnstable; Dukes; Eastern Plymouth; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth
